summary: A High-Quality Texture Replacer for Coins.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Tahoma]
[b][size=6]HQ Historically Accurate Coins

[/size][/b][/font][size=2][b]By extra sunny (niinq)[/b]
[/size]

[size=4][b]Description[/b][/size]

This is a simple texture replacer for the gold coins found around Skyrim. I tried to make the coins look weathered and old while still keeping the shiny golden look. It includes a regular diffuse texture and a normal map with a resolution of 512x512, so it won't drag your performance down too much while still looking great.


[size=4][b]Installation[/b][/size]

Manager: Click "download with manager", install, profit.

Manual: Extract "HQHistoricallyAccurateCoins" into your main Skyrim folder. Overwrite if asked.


[size=4][b]Credits/Permissions[/b]

[/size]You may not under any circumstances reupload this mod to any other websites (that includes the steam workshop).

If you want to make a video showcasing my mod then link me to it in the comments section as I'd love to see it (and possibly add it to this page) :).

If you have any other queries related to this mod then just PM me and I'll be sure to answer.


[size=4][b]Changelog

[/b][/size][size=2]v.1.0: -Initial release[/size]

v.2.0: -Added a specular map
-Added a mipmap
-Reduced file sizes


[size=4][b]If you like this mod then the best way for you to support me is to endorse it![/b][/size]

[/center]
author: niinq
